message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. It's worth a lot to me, but I believe it has even greater potential in your hands. I'm starting with a price of $1150000. This reflects the value I place on the product and leaves room for negotiation.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I would like to propose a price of $1050000.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1050000 doesn't quite reflect the true value of this product. Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to come down to $1100000. This is a fair compromise that acknowledges both our perspectives.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $1075000.

Bob, I value your interest in this product, but $1075000 is still below the true worth.  I'm willing to go a little further and offer it for $1090000.  This represents a significant compromise, and we're getting closer to a deal.
Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $1082500.

Bob, we're getting very close. I want to make this work, but $1082500 still falls short of what the product is truly worth.  To demonstrate my commitment to reaching a deal, I'm willing to offer it for $1085000. This is my final compromise.
Alice, I appreciate your efforts in trying to reach an agreement. I would like to propose a price of $1087500.
